casebody.data:
In the Matter of the FORECLOSURE OF the DEEDS OF TRUST EXECUTED BY Grover C. BROWN and wife, Margaret C. Brown Dated April 1, 1980, Recorded in Book 949 at Page 109, and Book 949 at Page 111, Buncombe County Registry. No. 224PA15. Supreme Court of North Carolina. Sept. 24, 2015. Wilder Wadford, Weaverville, for Brown, Grover C., et al. Adam W. Bull, Asheville, for Almond, Nelson T. (Executor), et al. John R. Dillard, for First Choice Title, LLC.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 2nd of July 2015 by Petitioners (Grover & Margaret Brown) in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 24th of September 2015."
